attributes.review: First off the app lags and has horrible photos and fake news. When you first open the app it has such a ugly picture. It goes really so slow and I’ve all the app has pixels and doesn’t even work correctly it takes so much personal information it shouldn’t. It’s just a horrible app and needs to be closed down.

attributes.review: I opened up the app and immediately smelt I big fat fart smell. 🙄 I thought it was probably just my dog or something but then when I exited the house I STILL smelt it. I wanted to just get the app about the big Cheeto man but I just couldn’t. 😔 cause the smell was SOOO horrid I ended up with a after smell still stunk up the WHOLE house. It was so bad I HAD TO MOVE. Ugh 1 star review I guess Cheeto man do stink after all.
attributes.title: It made my tablet stink… ew

attributes.review: Hello, My name is Massimo and recently after going off my boat scene, I decided to buy this app, just to try it out you know 💞, After this my girlfriend Laura got stolen 👁👄👁 it’s okay tho I have my sides, 💋, and after this my dog started flying out of nowhere went to go buy some trump 2020 flags and cookies and came back 💔, I was shocked 😧, I’m disappointed, from my experiences I do not recommend 💞💝💕👄✨🧚🏻‍♀️.
attributes.title: My Dog Is Flying

attributes.review: I cannot believe that this app has such horrible images and content inside of it plus it took up most of the storage on my phone it disgusts me how many people are on this app and actually like it it is insane how horrible this app is I have had a horrible experience please delete this app from existence BLM don’t be a racist like trump❌❌ 🤮🤢
attributes.title: This decision was the worst in my life

attributes.review: So I downloaded this app because I LOVE TRUMP. I wanted to keep up with all of the alerts. So I downloaded the app. As soon as I downloaded the app a clown popped up on my phone. I’m deathly afraid, so I had a seizure on spot. I was rushed to the hospital and moral of the story almost died. I’ve read more reviews on how this app does weird things when you download it. I didn’t believe, but don’t download this app. I almost died 👁.👁
attributes.title: C L O W N 🤡

attributes.review: i am now traumatized by the fat cheeto i saw,i proceeded to scroll on bc momma ain’t raise no 🐕😤. then the cheeto walked through my door n took my little brother 😿. then cheeto came back and said he needed my money for another spray tan and i said no❤️. he then proceeded to kill me. at least i went to heaven i told god if he could remove him from the earth and i went down to hell bc i shouldn’t be wishing death upon ppl😔. anyways the devil politely agreed to my question. 😜. so he sent out a demon and it turns out cheeto didn’t die but the demon became a trump supporter too so our plan totally failed. so anyways i am now in hell chillin w the devil yktfv 😸. but yeah bad app✨
attributes.title: it’s a no for me ❤️

attributes.review: I open the app and I i was blinded by ugly Cheeto so I had to get lip surgery bc it was so bad and then I got called that my ice insurance was not paying for it bc I’m illegall so I had to go back to Mexican and get a green card only to find out that it would take years to get so then to pay it off I had to start selling drugs become a part time stripper and become a hit man yea all bc of this app
attributes.title: I’m illegally okey

attributes.review: I downloaded this app…and the first thing I saw was pictures OF HUMAN FECES WITH TUPES! Absolutely HORRID! I need therapy and I demanded that they pay for not putting trigger warnings before the app loads😡🤮 Customer support does not help at all and they tricked me into coming to there headquarters thinking that I’d get pay. But instead they trapped me in a cage and a giant piece of HUMAN FECES walked over to me and started SPITTING ON ME!!! I got out of there with 0 dignity left. BUT PLEse do NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP AND BEWARE.
attributes.title: SCAM!!!!!!

attributes.title: BAD APP DONT GET IT
